ABOUT US

WHO WE ARE

Conceived and formally established by Ali, Almaw, Alemu, Amare & Ashenafi (5A Jurists Consultancy Group PLC) is an aspiring full-service consultancy office in Ethiopia. With prominent lawyers and legal team that has over and above 30 years of experience in consulting and representing clients on a wide range of legal issues concerning business and investment in the country, our consultancy firm has begun to make its early influence felt on the Ethiopian legal system. We are committed to treating each of our clients with courtesy, respect and compassion regardless of the size of their case. We are a firm that will be here in the future, which weve guaranteed with a succession plan to maintain our exemplary service to you for decades to come.

Contact Today!

Our Vision

Our vision is to be the most trusted consulting service Office in Ethiopia and the African Continent We are a firm that will be here in the future, which weve guaranteed with a succession plan to maintain our exemplary service to you for decades to come.

Our Mission

To provide consultancy services according to the highest ethical and professional standards and high integrity. We strive to make our office to be a synonym for prestige through our high caliber and experienced staff and by providing tailored services that meet each of our clients specific needs.

Charities and Nonprofit Organizations

From daily operational issues through investigations and litigation, 5A Jurists Consultancy Group clients include social welfare and philanthropic organizations, certification and accreditation agencies, and scientific and educational societies.

Mining

Our lawyers work together to execute domestic and cross-border transactions with ease, provide timely counsel, and help clients navigate the evolving mining sector in Ethiopia. 5A Jurists Consultancy Group has a strong team of legal experts

Employement and Immigration

We understand that the employer /employee working relationship may have been built for years based on hard service and mutual understanding. Thus, we recognize that employment matters need to be managed carefully and disputes should be resolved tactfully and as quickly as possible.

Taxtion

Tax issues underlie virtually every business formation, plan, and transaction whether domestic, international, or cross-border. Tax laws and regulations are more than just considerations; they often drive business strategy, structure, and deal consummation.

ICT & Telecom

Tax issues underlie virtually every business formation, plan, and transaction whether domestic, international, or cross-border. Tax laws and regulations are more than just considerations; they often drive business strategy, structure, and deal consummation.

Coporates

About us

    5A is an Ethiopian consulting firm that aspires to be a full-service firm. With a legal team that has over 30 years of experience in advising and representing clients on a wide range of legal matters relating to business and investment in the country.
